metadata.title: CVE-2023-3153 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in Open Virtual Network where the service monitor MAC doesnot properly rate limit. This issue could allow an attacker to cause adenial of service, including on deployments with CoPP enabled and properlyconfigured.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-3153` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ovn-central - 23.03.1-1ubuntu0.23.04.1
ovn-common - 23.03.1-1ubuntu0.23.04.1
ovn-controller-vtep - 23.03.1-1ubuntu0.23.04.1
ovn-host - 23.03.1-1ubuntu0.23.04.1
ovn-ic - 23.03.1-1ubuntu0.23.04.1
ovn-ic-db - 23.03.1-1ubuntu0.23.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ovn package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '23.03.1-1ubuntu0.23.04.1').
